thread.title: U.S. stocks end slightly higher as oil rally fades
thread.title_full: U.S. stocks end slightly higher as oil rally fades - MarketWatch

author: Anora Mahmudova
title: U.S. stocks end slightly higher as oil rally fades
text: A wall Street rally ran out of steam Thursday, as early optimism stemming from dovish comments from European Central Bank President Mario Draghi faded. Meanwhile, oil futures trimmed earlier gains, reducing the advance in energy stocks. The main benchmark index S&P 500 and Dow industrials closed marginally higher, while the Nasdaq Composite ended with a loss. Thursday's volatile action comes a day ahead of important monthly payroll numbers that are seen as crucial in determining the Federal Reserve's decision on interest rates. The S&P 500 SPX, +0.12% closed 2.27 points, or 0.1% higher to 1,951.13. The Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.14% gained 23.38 points, or 0.1%, to 16,374.76. The Nasdaq Composite COMP, -0.35% ended the day down 16.48 points, or 0.4% at 4,733.50.
